name: Please Mind the Romance
description:
The two degenerates, Ooka and Ruth, have been living in the same apartment for a while now. They get along really well unless it's a discussion about which one of them is the best shipper.

This is the 3rd "book" out of 4 of my planned books about my OC's lore (to be written when I have the attention span to actually write them)

This was also something I passed for my Finals Output. At least the first part, which is really short.

I will continue this when I actually have the time to work on it and not just rush everything *cough cough* college *cough cough*

Art by me
Backgrounds were made by me in The Sims 4 and the screenshotted. Please I know I suck at designing
Music from: 별 헤는 다락방 Starry Attic on youtube
별 헤는 다락방 Starry Attic - YouTube
(i didn't know how to credit them in Renpy so here it is)
